rawText:
<T>(
  array: T[],
  items: T | T[],
  /**
   *
   */
  beforeIndex: number
): T[] => {
  const itemsArray = Array.isArray(items) ? items : [items];

  // NB: slice makes copies
  const before = array.slice(0, beforeIndex);
  const after = array.slice(beforeIndex);
  return [...before, ...itemsArray, ...after];
}
name: insertAt
